text: The Other Side of Life is the 12th studio album by English progressive rock band The Moody Blues and released on 9 April 1986 through Polydor Records. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 24 in the United Kingdom and number 34 in Australia. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1986 albums Category:The Moody Blues albums
title: The Other Side of Life
